title: NFL teams - number of Facebook fans 2019
summary: This bar chart has 32 columns on the x axis representing Team, and Facebook fans in millions in each Team on the y axis.
Team Dallas Cowboys has the highest Facebook fans in millions and Jacksonville Jaguars has the lowest Facebook fans in millions.
The highest Team Dallas Cowboys has 7.95 more Facebook fans in millions than the lowest Team Jacksonville Jaguars.
